hero.title: Manage Your Shop with Confidence
hero.description: mBiz is your all-in-one digital business manager. Track inventory, manage sales, and build customer relationships effortlessly.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Shops
features.description: Everything you need to run and grow your business in one intuitive platform.
features.smart_inventory_desc: Track stock levels in real-time, get low stock alerts, and manage multiple locations effortlessly.
features.sales_analytics_desc: Understand your sales patterns with detailed reports and insights to grow your business.
features.customer_mgmt_desc: Build lasting relationships with customer profiles, purchase history, and loyalty tracking.
features.financial_reports_desc: Generate comprehensive financial reports and manage invoicing with ease.
features.mobile_app_desc: Manage your shop from anywhere with our powerful iOS and Android applications.
features.secure_reliable_desc: Bank-level security ensures your business data is always safe and protected.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your business. Upgrade or downgrade anytime, no long-term contracts.

benefits.title: Why Choose mBiz?
benefits.easy_to_use_desc: Intuitive interface that requires no technical skills. Start managing your business in minutes.
benefits.affordable_desc: Competitive pricing designed for businesses of all sizes. Scale as you grow.
benefits.support_desc: Dedicated support team ready to help you succeed. Available via email and chat.
benefits.growth_desc: Advanced features that scale with your business. Add branches and users as you expand.
benefits.secure_desc: Enterprise-grade encryption and security protocols protect your business data.
benefits.offline_desc: Work even without internet. Changes sync automatically when connection is restored.
